step_data.thought: After reviewing the current page, I notice that the product 'ACPOTEL Night Vision Monocular' is not listed. The current page is showing the 'BARSKA 3-90 x 100mm Spotting Scope Porro Prisms Waterproof Fog-Proof with Tripod and Case'. Since the user wants to add the ACPOTEL Night Vision Monocular to their shopping cart, I need to navigate to the correct product page first. I will use the search feature to locate the product.
